title: Indian carmakers post SUV-led June sales growth amid heat waves
description: Carmakers Mahindra & Mahindra, Toyota Motor Corp's Indian unit, and Kia Motor reported increased car sales in June. This rise was driven by demand for sports utility vehicles (SUVs), despite heat waves affecting purchase decisions.
